snippet: The country’s largest bank earned $5 billion in the last quarter, easily beating forecasts, despite a deeper loss from a trade that went wrong.
abstract: Jump in JPMorgan shares blows away a cloud of concern hanging over the banking industry and sets off a rally in stocks, ending a six-day losing streak for the market.
lead_paragraph: The country’s largest bank earned $5 billion in the last quarter, easily beating forecasts, despite a deeper loss from a trade that went wrong.

headline.seo: Big Gains at JPMorgan Strengthen Outlook on Banking Sector
headline.main: JPMorgan Shares Ignite Rally, Ending a 6-Day Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Shares Ignite Rally, Ending a 6-Day Losing Streak
